name: Amalgamated Capital
overview: Amalgamated Capital provides senior cash flow debt financing and lending services to lower middle market companies. It offers financing products including revolvers, term loans, senior stretch loans, one-stop structures, and letters of credit. Additionally, the company provides treasury management services. It focuses on financing size between $15 million to $50 million. The company also offers transactions advisory services such as acquisitions, buyouts, recapitalizations, and re-financings. It caters to business services, consumer products, defense and aerospace, distribution, education, food and beverage, healthcare, manufacturing, and software and IT services sectors. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in New York, New York. Amalgamated Capital operates as a subsidiary of Amalgamated Bank.
